again ---> in the list there are items with "(recovery mode)" at the end. choose one of them (with cursor keys) and press enter

choose that. in the promt type this « ls /home/ » it should return a list of usernames (home folders)
finally once you know the username run « passwd username » you wil be asked for a new password twice
